name: *Exclusive* Purple Valley 3rd Metaverse Portal
description: Purple Valley, a viral trend with more than 20 million shares that started as an AR experience and now is turning out as an collectible game - this nft is a gift for those who attended the third event of Purple Valley Metaverse Gallery and signed the guestbook on May 23, 2021 - The art-centric bubble represents the energy created by all the people who have connected with Purple Valley effect around the world â€“ thanks for being part of this whole experience
